TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElementEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115) and [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement> event occurs only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
## Examples The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement> event occurs. To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml.
``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Group xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <GroupName>MyGroup</GroupName> <GroupSize>Large</GroupSize> <GroupNumber>444</GroupNumber> <GroupBase>West</GroupBase> </Group> ```
[!code-cs[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.xml.serializati_13_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.xml.serializati_13_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.xml.serializati_13_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the object that represents the unknown XML element.
Docs.value: The object that represents the unknown XML element.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement> event occurs. To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml.
``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Group xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <GroupName>MyGroup</GroupName> <GroupSize>Large</GroupSize> <GroupNumber>444</GroupNumber> <GroupBase>West</GroupBase> </Group> ```
[!code-cs[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/p-system.xml.serializati_8_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/p-system.xml.serializati_8_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/p-system.xml.serializati_8_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a comma-delimited list of XML element names expected to be in an XML document instance.
Docs.value: A comma-delimited list of XML element names. Each name is in the following format: :.

Docs.summary: Gets the line number where the unknown element was encountered if the XML reader is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>.
Docs.value: The line number where the unknown element was encountered if the XML reader is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The LineNumber property returns a value only if the underlying XML reader is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>.
## Examples The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement> event occurs. To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml.
``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Group xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <GroupName>MyGroup</GroupName> <GroupSize>Large</GroupSize> <GroupNumber>444</GroupNumber> <GroupBase>West</GroupBase> </Group> ```
[!code-cs[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/p-system.xml.serializati_29_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/p-system.xml.serializati_29_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/p-system.xml.serializati_29_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the place in the line where the unknown element occurs if the XML reader is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>.
Docs.value: The number in the line where the unknown element occurs if the XML reader is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement> event occurs. To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml.
``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Group xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <GroupName>MyGroup</GroupName> <GroupSize>Large</GroupSize> <GroupNumber>444</GroupNumber> <GroupBase>West</GroupBase> </Group> ```

Docs.summary: Gets the object the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> is deserializing.
Docs.value: The object that is being deserialized by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.

remarks.format:
